Updates should be made to reflect customer policy/procedures and when any changes to widget settings are made]: # **10.2.1.2** - Privileged account activity is required to be captured and retained. Monitor this widget for anomalous behavior. **1.2.8** - Monitor this widget for users that should not have access to network control systems or network configuration files and investigate unfamiliar users. **8.2.2** - Shared Accounts should only be used when necessary on an exception basis. This widget should be monitored for anomalous levels of shared account activity. **9.2.1.1** - Physical Access to to sensitive areas within a Cardholder Data Environment are to be monitored. **7.2.5** - System and Service Accounts should be limited to least privilege. This widget should be monitored for activity that is anomalous for the related system and service accounts privileges. **10.2.1.5** - Audit Logs for elevations of privileges are required to be captured and maintained. This widget should be monitored for anomalous levels of elevated privileges. **8.2.7** - Third-Party Activity in PCI environments should be monitored for unexpected activity. dependencies.name: PCI - Elevated Privileges
dependencies.filter: general_information.common_event_name contains Privilege Assigned OR general_information.common_event_name contains Special Privileges Assigned
dependencies.layout: {"search":{"LRSearchRequest":{"filter":"general_information.common_event_name contains Privilege Assigned OR general_information.common_event_name contains Special Privileges Assigned","aggregations":{"aggregationRequests":[{"aggregationType":"COUNT_TREND","bucketInterval":"1h","bucketLimit":24,"bucketOrder":"TOP","field":"general_information.standard_message_time"}]},"pageRequest":{"limit":100},"dateTime":"now-12M","time":{"field":"general_information.standard_message_time","lrDateTime":"now-12M"}}},"config":{"timeRangeId":"last12months","timeRangeName":"Last 12 months","autoRefresh":false},"grid":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":0,"h":0,"minW":0,"minH":0,"moved":false,"static":true},"columns":["general_information.standard_message_time","general_information.raw_message","general_information.common_event_name","unattributed.account.email_address","unattributed.host.ip_address.value","origin.host.ip_address.ipv4","general_information.log_source.name","general_information.log_source.type_name","origin.account.name","target.host.name"]}
